title: Top media publishers in the U.S. 2017 , by online traffic
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Media Publisher, and Page views in millions in each Media Publisher on the y axis.
The Page views in millions is appeared to be the highest at Media Publisher msn.com and lowest at Media Publisher news.yahoo.com.
The Page views in millions of Media Publisher news.yahoo.com is 9.78% smaller than the maximum value at msn.com.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Media Publisher in the x axis and Page views in millions in the y axis.
The Page views in millions is highest at Media Publisher msn.com and lowest at Media Publisher news.yahoo.com.
Media Publisher  has the second highest value for Page views in millions.
The difference of Page views in millions between the highest and lowest Media Publisher is 1625.2.
Media Publisher msn.com is higher than any other Media Publishers with value 1810.3, followed by , and news.google.com. Down to Media Publisher news.yahoo.com with the lowest value 185.1.
The Media Publisher news.yahoo.com has 2.94 times less Page views in millions than average.
The Page views in millions is 12325.0 if we add up values of all Media Publishers.
